modName: EVDGYV - Eating Vampire Dust Gives You Vampirism
summary: Eating Vampire Dust Gives You Vampirism does exactly as it says. USLEEP and Non-USLEEP versions available.
descriptionHtml: Eating Vampire Dust Gives You Vampirism is a simple mod I made for personal use, because I wanted to become a vampire, and didn't want to start Dawnguard nor get lucky with a normal vampire. I decided to share the mod to everybody since it might prove useful.
author: ragminer
